pros: Awesome Place to Work Love It

pros: They have decent food and whatnot

review_title: Great hospital to work for, one of the few hospitals in NC that hasn't been acquired by a larger corporation.
pros: Small town feel with quality healthcare. Leadership is very involved with staff. Staff are pleasant. Company has a great sense of pride. The hospital is financially strong and growing exponentially.
cons: Limited service lines, but they are growing. Limited with resources to offer competitive salaries and benefit packages in comparison to organizations relatively close in distance.

review_title: Okay Job as long as you don't questiona anything
pros: Competitive pay for the area. Up-to-date equipment and knowledgable staff. Hospital is average in size so the patient flow isn't horrible on most day.
cons: The way things are are the way things they have always been if management didn't come up with the idea or at least think they did than you can forget it. Also alot of emphasize is put on the negative.

pros: Amazing compassionate team! Constant professionalism from every NHSC employ I ever interacted with.
cons: Call shift of 8 hrs is required for NON emergent Ultrasounds after FTE has already finished 8-10 hr shift.
